title: Premier League total broadcasting payments to clubs 2010 to 2019
summary: In general Broadcasting payments in million GBP has rose over the Year.
Broadcasting payments in million GBP is slightly increasing from 2012/13 to 2013/14, roughly constant from 2013/14 to 2015/16, and lastly slightly increasing from 2015/16 to 2016/17.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2015/16 and 2016/17.
The highest Broadcasting payments in million GBP, of value 2398.5 was reached at Year 2016/17
Minimum Broadcasting payments in million GBP about 1061.0 was reached at Year 2012/13
